enhanced_by.reason: The 'increased' map must be set before calling 'isCoreChanged' to ensure accurate core change detection.
The 'missing' map must be set before calling 'isCoreChanged' to ensure accurate core change detection.
Both methods determine the change status and can be used to verify the overall change result.
The 'getChangedElements' method provides a list of changed elements, which can be used to verify the changes detected by 'isCoreChanged'.
